title: Correction terms to Newton law due to induced gravity in AdS background
abstract: We calculate small correction terms to gravitational potential on Randall-Sundrum brane with an induced Einstein term. The behaviors of the correction terms depend on the magnitudes of $AdS$ radius $k^{-1}$ and a characteristic length scale $\l$ of model. We represent the gravitational potential for arbitrary $k$ and $\l$ at all distances.
